SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AI
The AI class represents the artificial intelligence for the game.
Board
The Board class represents the game board for a strategy game.
BoardView
The view responsible for displaying the Arimaa game board and handling user interactions related to the board.
Colors
The Colors enum represents the two possible colors for pieces in the game.
ControlsView
The view responsible for displaying game controls and information, such as time left, save options, step back functionality, and handling user interactions related to game controls.
Figures
The Figures enum represents the different types of game pieces.
GameController
The GameController class manages the state and flow of the game.
GameControllerTest
 
GameSerializer
The GameSerializer class provides methods for loading and saving game states.
GameSerializerTest
 
Main
The main class responsible for starting the Arimaa game application.
MainMenuView
The view responsible for displaying the main menu of the Arimaa game, providing options for starting a new game or loading a saved game.
NewGameView
The view responsible for displaying options for starting a new game in the Arimaa application, allowing the user to choose between playing versus another player or versus the computer.
Piece
The Piece class represents a game piece with a specific type and color.
State
The State class represents the state of a piece during a turn in the game.
ValidationHelper
The ValidationHelper class provides methods for validating moves and checking game rules.
ValidationHelperTest
